title: Create a Weekly Email Newsletter
description: An email marketer needs to assemble and write the content for the weekly newsletter.

tasks.description: Select the top 3 blog posts from the past week to feature in the newsletter.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the most popular recent content.

tasks.description: Write a short, engaging introduction for the newsletter.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes a compelling opening paragraph.

tasks.description: Assemble the newsletter in the email marketing platform, including the intro, links to the blog posts, and a featured product.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent builds the complete newsletter in the email tool, ready for sending.
